jd: From: Ayush, Pivotal-Technologies ayush.namdev@pivotal-technologies.com Reply to: ayush.namdev@pivotal-technologies.com POSITION Cloud Developer LOCATION Must be in Ocean City Maryland/Need DL of MDDURATION 6-12 months VISA USCPV Pinnacle Partners REQUIRED SKILLS Top Must Have Skills – Azure Data Bricks, Python, Spark, SQL, Kafka. Job Description:• Strong experience in automation (may or may not be Cloud)• Cloud testing backgroundo Azure Data Bricks, Python, Spark, SQL, Kafka• Apart of the development team – conversion from oracle SQL to Cloud• Not a straight migration – a lot of changes, the pharmacy portal itself is changingo Not a lift and shift• Needs someone to pick up the functional requirements & start leading with it• A plus is the understanding of the classes of OOP (object-oriented programing) in the Java Platform API library• Healthcare background is nice to have• Tools: Azure Data Bricks, Python, Spark, SQL, Kafka, OOP Thanks & Regards, Ayush Namdev Technical RecruiterOffice: +1 (703) 570-8775 Ext No-(230)Email- ayush.namdev@pivotal-technologies.comConnect with me:-- Pivotal Technologies, Inc. – Your Vision…Our Process
